name: The Dive (Astoeth, Gahnos)
description:
Made in 9h for Triple Trijam 2022

The Dive is a little game where you control a submarine looking for precious cristals.

Your objective is to reach 100M$ by mining cristals in underwater caves, the more you descend the more you can find valuables cristals and usefull equipment but danger also increase...

Along your dive you'll find new equipment to equip on your submarine, at the beginning, two slots out of 4 are used. You can change the control of each of them by clicking on their corresponding image on the UI.

When you run out of oxygen or your submarine is destroyed, you can start again, you'll keep your money but your new submarine will not have the equipment you looted for your old one.
